import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function NumberCell(_ref){let{value,row,col,onClick,isSelected,isRemoved,isSuccess,isNewNumber,isEmptyCell}=_ref;const handleClick=()=>{if(value!==null&&onClick){onClick(row,col);}};// Build className with animations
let className="";if(isSelected)className+="selected ";if(isRemoved)className+="fade-out ";if(isSuccess)className+="success-flash ";if(isSelected&&!isRemoved&&!isSuccess)className+="pulse ";if(isNewNumber)className+="new-number ";if(isEmptyCell)className+="empty-cell ";return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{onClick:handleClick,className:className.trim(),children:value!==null?value:""});}
